languages.text: Once the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has killed four enemies in total, the next {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which requires spending {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} will cost no wounds and instead restore {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} wounds.

traits.locale_text: Once the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has killed four enemies in total, their next {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which requires spending {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} will cost no wounds and instead restore {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} wounds.

Once the Bladedancer has killed 4 enemies in total, the next Bladedancer's ability that requires spending wounds, will cost no wounds and will restore <u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u> wounds to the Bladedancer instead.

Once the Bladedancer has killed 4 enemies in total, the next Bladedancer's ability that requires spending wounds, will cost no wounds and will restore <u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u> wounds to the Bladedancer instead.

Once the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has killed four enemies in total, the next {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which requires spending {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} will cost no wounds and instead restore {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} wounds.

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} mate a cuatro enemigos en total, su próxima {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que requiera un gasto de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no costará ninguna, y en su lugar restaurará {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} heridas.
languages.original_text: Once the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has killed four enemies in total, the next {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which requires spending {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} will cost no wounds and instead restore {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} wounds.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} mate a cuatro enemigos en total, su próxima {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que requiera un gasto de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no costará ninguna, y en su lugar restaurará <u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g})</u> heridas.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が合計4体の敵を倒すと、その次の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を消費する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で傷を消費せず、代わりに{uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea}の傷を回復する。
languages.original_text: Once the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has killed four enemies in total, the next {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which requires spending {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} will cost no wounds and instead restore {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} wounds.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が合計4体の敵を倒すと、その次の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を消費する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で傷を消費せず、代わりに{uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea}の傷を回復する。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}总共击杀了4名敌人之后，刀锋舞者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}不再会消耗5点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，而是会改为恢复{uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea}点生命值。
languages.original_text: Once the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has killed four enemies in total, the next {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which requires spending {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} will cost no wounds and instead restore {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} wounds.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}总共击杀了4名敌人之后，刀锋舞者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}不再会消耗5点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，而是会改为恢复<u>（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点生命值。

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} a tué quatre ennemis au total, sa prochaine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui devrait coûter des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} le soigne à hauteur de {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} blessures à la place.

languages.text: Hat der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} vier Gegner getötet, kostet seine nächste {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} erfordert, keine Wunden, sondern regeneriert stattdessen {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} Wunden.
languages.original_text: Once the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has killed four enemies in total, the next {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which requires spending {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} will cost no wounds and instead restore {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} wounds.

traits.locale_text: Hat der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} vier Gegner getötet, kostet seine nächste {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} erfordert, keine Wunden, sondern regeneriert stattdessen {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} Wunden.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} убивает 4 врагов, его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, требующая затрат {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, вместо расхода восстанавливает ему {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} здоровья.

traits.locale_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} убивает 4 врагов, его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, требующая затрат {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, вместо расхода восстановит ему <u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g})</u> здоровья.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g} toplamda dört düşman öldürdüğünde {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı harcamayı gerektiren bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, hiç sağlık puanı götürmez. Aksine {uip|Heal|bc9759f0c41a4a3e84300557bea51dea} sağlık puanı tazelenir.
